author: Source: Dudleynews.co.uk
title: Matt Damon: Working with Ridley Scott is a 'lifelong' dream - Dudleynews.co.uk
text:
The Bourne star finally got his wish when the pair collaborated on outer space film The Martian, which also stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kristen Wiig and Jessica Chastain. The Oscar-winning actor said: "I don't take too much calculus when I'm taking on a movie.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Dudleynews.co.uk.
